GREAT movie, but just a FYI, the subs work UNTIL about 64 minutes into it. After that the subtitles start appearing about 20 seconds before the corresponding video.  

I'll look around for other subtitle tracks and link them if I can find them.

Bingo.  Found a perfect English subtitles version, available here:

http://subtitles.o2.cz/d/185798/The+Storm+Riders.html

cheers!!

The Storm Riders (traditional Chinese: ???????) is a 1998 Hong Kong film directed by Andrew Lau. It is based on a comic book called Fung Wan (or Tin Ha). It stars Ekin Cheng as Wind and Aaron Kwok as Cloud. The plot involves two children, Whispering Wind and Striding Cloud, who become powerful warriors under the evil warlord Conquer's tutelage.

why is out two storm riders ?

help please ?

Films
The Storm Riders.[1] (1998) - a Hong Kong film starring Ekin Cheng as Wind and Aaron Kwok as Cloud. 
The Storm Warriors (2009) - a sequel to the 1998 film. Ekin Cheng and Aaron Kwok reprise their previous roles in the prequel film. 
Storm Rider Clash of the Evils - an animated feature film by Puzzle Animation Studio Limited. It was released in 2008. A 5 minute animated clip was released. 
[edit] Television series
Wind and Cloud (2002) - a Taiwanese production. Starred Peter Ho as Cloud and Vincent Zhao as Wind. 
Wind and Cloud II (2004) - a sequel to the 2002 series. Peter Ho and Vincent Zhao reprise their roles.
